explanation: [0-0] Sergio Ramos is sitting on a chair, wearing a blue jersey and blue socks, bending over to tie his shoelaces. The black caption "PSG English Twitter" is displayed at the top of the screen.

[0-10] He then ties his shoelaces, stands up, and adjusts his jersey. The camera zooms in as he turns his head to the left and looks ahead, swaying his body left and right twice. The camera then zooms out; he brushes his left arm with his right hand and lets both arms hang naturally, speaking. He then looks down briefly before looking up again.
